Pre-Game Insights: Miami Heat and Sacramento Kings will face off in a non-conference matchup on November 5, 2024.
Miami Heat finished the 2023-24 season with a 46-36 overall record and a 22-19 record at home.
Sacramento Kings finished the 2023-24 season with a 46-36 overall record and a 22-19 record on the road.
Miami Heat averaged 110.1 points per game while allowing 108.4 points per game last season.
Sacramento Kings averaged 116.6 points per game last season, with 15.5 points from free throws and 43.2 points from 3-point range.
Injuries for the Miami Heat include Duncan Robinson (out, personal) and Kevin Love (out, personal).
Injuries for the Sacramento Kings include Devin Carter (out, shoulder), Kevin Huerter (day to day, illness), and Orlando Robinson (day to day, MCL).
